message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this incredible product.  It's truly one-of-a-kind. To make this simple, I'm starting with an offer of $1,500,000.  Given its value, I believe this is a very fair starting point.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I'm looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $1,200,000?

Bob, I understand your desire to work within a budget. While this product's value is truly unique, I'm willing to move closer to your range. How about we consider $1,350,000? This reflects my willingness to negotiate while acknowledging the inherent value of what's on offer.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on $1,300,000 for the product?
